tools.zoom-and-pan.warning.low-scale: Scaling lower than 80% or greater than 130% is not recommended.
tools.zoom-and-pan.title: Zoom & Pan (Image)
tools.zoom-and-pan.desc: Supplements the automatic random zoom and pan display of fill images (or fit if under Copyright and not croppable). Configure Start and End positions, dimensions, and motion type (Constant, Ease In/Out, Accelerate/Decelerate). Drop onto an image in the timeline.
tools.title: Title
tools.title.bin.tooltip: Drag and drop in timeline. Indicate referenced artwork (1 or more), if before or after on the timeline. Indicate what to show (Title, Author, Datation, Description, Credits), configure text and background/foreground colors.
